data.eml:eml: A new species of Neochrysocharis Kurdjumov (Hymenoptera: Eulophidae), a parasitoid of serpentine leafminers (Diptera: Agromyzidae) in Southeast Asia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fisher, Nicole, Salle, John La (2005): A new species of Neochrysocharis Kurdjumov (Hymenoptera: Eulophidae), a parasitoid of serpentine leafminers (Diptera: Agromyzidae) in Southeast Asia. Zootaxa 1044: 27-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.169868
